attributes.action: Let the people have a vote on remaining in the EEA and EFTA
attributes.additional_details:
Norway and members of the EEA have the highest welfare of its people in the entire European Union. They benefit from international trade deals as well as the EU trade deals. All these countries have lower immigration rates than the EU and are economically strong countries. 

It would require freedom of movement which allows the UK around sustain million of jobs, however in Norway EU citizens are required to register with the police which controls the amount of EU citiznes entering Norway.
attributes.background: Joining the EEA and EFTA has shown to satisfy both remainers and leave voters, as it was a close call. It has been proven to be safest option and the best option for the UK economy, and allows all the issues to be addressed which concern the people. It allows the UK to control laws and immigration.
